subject: Real Estate
title: Why Land Is Different from Other Assets
description: A quick win: understand Why Land Is Different from Other Assets.

hook.text: You can build more cars, print more books, and mine more gold. You cannot make more land.

buildup.text: Land supply is essentially fixed. When demand rises, prices spike because nobody can produce more.

discovery.text: This inelasticity is why real estate behaves so differently from stocks, bonds, or commodities.

twist.text: Some cities cheat the limit â€” Singapore, Dubai, and Hong Kong have built new land from the sea.

climax.text: But even reclaimed land is tiny compared to demand. Scarcity is the permanent engine of property value.

punchline.text: Every asset can be made â€” except the ground.
